# synchronize()

**Instance Method**

Causes all in-memory data and attributes of the file represented by the file handle to write to permanent storage.

## Declaration

```swift
func synchronize() throws
```

## Discussion

Programs that require the file to always be in a known state should call this method. An invocation of this method doesn’t return until memory is flushed.

## Operating on a File

- **close()**: Disallows further access to the represented file or communications channel and signals end of file on communications channels that permit writing.
- **truncate(atOffset:)**: Truncates or extends the file represented by the file handle to a specified offset within the file and puts the file pointer at that position.
